summary: "The Price Is Right" is a popular American TV game show that started in 1972. Contestants guess the prices of items to win money and prizes. People from the audience are chosen to play, and the host says the famous phrase, "Come on down!" Bob Barker hosted for a long time, and then Drew Carey took over. The show has had many announcers and models. It's the longest-running game show in the U.S. and has aired thousands of episodes. In 2022, it was honored in the NAB Broadcasting Hall of Fame.
title: The Price Is Right
